author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Stratasys reports Q4 Gaap Loss Per Share $0.19
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Stratasys Ltd:
* STRATASYS RELEASES FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.16
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.19 * Q4 REVENUE $179.3 MILLION VERSUS $175.3 MILLION * SEES ‍REVENUE GUIDANCE OF $670 TO $700 MILLION INCOME FOR FISCAL YEAR ENDING DECEMBER 31, 2018​
* SEES FY 2018 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.46 TO $0.75 * SEES FY 2018 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.30 TO $0.50
* ‍CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE PROJECTED AT $40 TO $50 MILLION FOR 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Brief@thomsonreuters.com)
